mapper.select: SELECT m.Major ,m.MajorCode AS id, m.University, m.School,m.SchoolCode, (SELECT s.Icon FROM schoolsheet AS s WHERE m.SchoolCode=s.SchoolCode ) AS Icon,(SELECT s.Image FROM schoolsheet AS s WHERE m.SchoolCode=s.SchoolCode ) AS Image FROM mastermajorview AS m WHERE m.Major LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') AND m.Major !='' GROUP BY m.Major, m.MajorCode, m.University, m.School, m.SchoolCode

SELECT j.Name, j.Id, j.Major, j.Field, j.University, j.School, (SELECT t.Icon FROM teacherview AS t WHERE t.Id=j.Id) AS Icon FROM mastermajorview AS j WHERE j.Field LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') AND j.Field !=''

SELECT j.Name, j.Id, j.Major, j.Field, j.University, j.School, (SELECT t.Icon FROM teacherview AS t WHERE t.Id=j.Id) AS Icon FROM mastermajorview AS j WHERE j.Field LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') AND j.Field !='' LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}
